newsArray.description: Coming into bat at No.7, MS Dhoni took 26 balls for his unbeaten 30 which included just one four and one six. Chennai Super Kings lost to Delhi Capitals by 25 runs.

newsArray.title: CSK Vs DC, IPL 2025 Highlights: KL Rahul, Vipraj Nigam Lead Capitals' Historic 25-Run Chennai Thrashing
newsArray.description: Delhi Capitals defeated Chennai Super Kings by 25 runs at MA Chidambaram Stadium, maintaining their unbeaten run in IPL 2025. KL Rahul scored 77, while Vipraj Nigam took 2/27.

newsArray.title: CSK vs DC, IPL 2025: धोनी भी चेन्नई की हार नहीं टाल पाए, दिल्ली ने 25 रन से हराया
creator: ArbindKumar Mishra
newsArray.description: CSK vs DC, IPL 2025: दिल्ली कैपिटल्स ने इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग मैच में शनिवार को चेन्नई सुपरकिंग्स को 25 रन से हराया. दिल्ली ने छह विकेट पर 183 रन बनाने के बाद चेन्नई की पारी को पांच विकेट पर 158 रन पर रोक दिया. चेन्नई के लिए विजय शंकर ने नाबाद 69 जबकि महेंद्र सिंह धोनी ने नाबाद 30 रन की पारी खेली.The post CSK vs DC, IPL 2025: धोनी भी चेन्नई की हार नहीं टाल पाए, दिल्ली ने 25 रन से हराया appeared first on Prabhat Khabar.

newsArray.title: PBKS vs RR Live Score, IPL 2025: Sanju Samson, Yshasvi Jaiswal Get Rajasthan Royals Off To Cautious Start
creator: Times Now Digital
newsArray.description: Punjab Kings vs Rajasthan Royals Live: Punjab Kings are all set to take on Rajasthan Royals in the first game of the IPL 2025 at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh stadium in Mullanpur in the second game of the double header day on April 5 (Saturday). Both teams are coming into the game with momentum on their side, as both RR and PBKS have won their last games in the tournament. However, while RR would look to remove themselves from the bottom half of the table, the home side would want to maintain their position at the top of the IPL 2025 points table. The toss might play a major role in the outcome of the match.Sanju Samson did not captain Rajasthan Royals in the first three matches of the IPL 2025 against Sunrisers Hyderabad, Kolkata Knight Riders and Chennai Super Kings. He only played as a batter, while Riyan Parag was the skipper of the franchise. This was because, he had a finger injury and was not cleared to keep wickets or do any sort of fielding.Now, he will return to captain the side for the first time in the IPL 2025 against PBKS as he has been cleared to keep wickets by the BCCI Centre of Excellence.TOSS: Punjab Kings have won the toss and opted to bowl first.Catch all the latest live updates of PBKS Vs RR IPL 2025 match:

newsArray.title: IPL 2025: CSK Slump To Third Defeat Of Campaign As Unbeaten DC Pick Up 25 Run Win At MAC | In Pictures
newsArray.description: DC posted a total of 183/6, thanks to KL Rahuls' 77-run knock, before defending it by limiting CSK to 158/5 as Vijay Shankar's unbeaten 69-run innings went in vain.

newsArray.title: KL Rahul Inspires DC To Crush CSK by 25 runs To Break 15-Year Jinx at Chepauk
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: KL Rahul broke the shackles with a six over deep square leg off Khaleel before CSK skipper Ruturaj Gaikwad introduced spin in the form of the seasoned Ravichandran Ashwin in the sixth over, hoping for a wicket.

newsArray.title: पंजाब किंग्स और राजस्थान रॉयल्स के मैच का लाइव स्कोरकार्ड
newsArray.description: इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग 2025 का 18वां मुकाबला आज यानी पांच अप्रैल को पंजाब किंग्स क्रिकेट टीम बनाम राजस्थान रॉयल्स क्रिकेट टीम के बीच खेला जा रहा हैं. दोनों टीमों के बीच यह मुकाबला चंडीगढ़ के महाराजा यादवेन्द्र सिंह इंटरनेशनल क्रिकेट स्टेडियम में खेला जा रहा हैं.
